basic.Peptide Name: Antibacterial peptide PMAP-37 (Myeloid antibacterial peptide 37; pigs, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ML35 (MIC=2 µM), Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=1 µM), Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=2 µM), Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC=4 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=2 µM).Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium Bm11 (MIC=4 µM), Bacillus megaterium local isolate (IC=4 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=32 µM), Staphylococcus aureus Cowan 1 (MIC=64 µM).
